channel.title: arielleRevisPortfolioRSS
channel.description: The personal Portfolio of Arielle Revis, an ongoing endeavor in Rensselaer's Introduction to ITWS class

item.title: lab01
item.description: A collection of screenshots and simple html pages that I made after my introduction to html, gitHub, VS Code, etc

item.title: lab02
item.description: In this lab I created an online resume using the html and css skills learned in class. We hadn't learned about external css so the css is created and implemented solely for lab02.

item.title: lab03
item.description: During this lab, I created the entirety of this portfolio. From just a few folders on this repository, I expanded this site to be extensible for the rest of the semester. I used used both html and external css to describe and style my site.

item.title: lab04
item.description: In this lab, we created both RSS and ATOM xml files to contain data about the past labs we have done
